resources.string: Step 1: Place the phone at your feet, right in front of you. Swipe the slider button across the screen to the right with your finger. Then quickly raise the phone straight up, and place it on top of your head.
Step 2: Swipe the slider button across the screen with your finger while it is on top of your head. Then lower the phone down back to the ground.
Step 3: Swipe the slider button across the screen with your finger while it is on the ground, and you have finished measuring!

Extra Tips: 
1. You can calibrate the phone before making any measurements to increase accuracy. You only need to do this once.
2. Keep the phone steady and horizontal while moving it up and down.
3. Moving the phone a large distance sideways (such as while placing the phone on your head) will lower the height below what it should be.
4. Smooth and constant acceleration will incrase the accuracy. 
This means moving quickly but without sudden jolts.
